item.description: Device # Are hardware devices connected to GoTrack platform to manage, monitor and track. These devices can be Black Box Locator or Camera.

item.title: 3.4 Edit Device
item.description: Edit Device # To start Edit and configure the device, the user selects Manage > Devices Click on Edit of that device, the following dialog box will appear: 1. Basic # Device information: IMEI: Device identification number. (No editing allowed). Account: Your username/username. (No editing allowed). Icon: Click on the box right below to select the icon of the vehicle/vehicle in which you install the device.

item.title: 3.6 Equipment Management
item.description: Equipment Management # To start Equipment Management and configure the device, the user selects Manage > Devices 1. Move / Sell # To transfer/assign the device to another account, there are 3 ways: Way 1 Step 1: Tick the device to be Move/Sell. Step 2: Choose Move / Sell. Step 3: A dialog box appears. Select Destination account to transfer/sell the device there.
